WEIGHTY_CONTAINERS.SETTINGS.gmOnlyButton: If checked, only the Gamemaster can access the weight reduction configuration button on container sheets.
WEIGHTY_CONTAINERS.Dialog.SetReductionHi: Enter the percentage by which item weight should be reduced inside this container.
WEIGHTY_CONTAINERS.Notifications.Capacit: Cannot add/increase item: Container '{containerName}' capacity exceeded.
